answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Shannon – I hope the following is helpful:
Cary, NC - 2010-2011 Communications Plan
http://www.townofcary.org/Departments/Administration/pio/commplan_5096.htm 
Westminster, UK - Westminster City Council Communications Plan 2012-13
http://www.westminster.gov.uk/workspace/assets/publications/CommsPlan2012_13.012-1343041559.pdf
Civicus - Internal Communication Toolkit 
http://www.civicus.org/new/media/CIVICUSInternalCommunicationToolkit.pdf
University of Minn – Reinventing Internal Communications
http://www1.umn.edu/urelate/pdf/RICrecommendations4-09.pdf 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Shannon Paul
text: I am looking for examples of successful Change Management and Internal Communications Plans or some guidance about good writings on the topic.  Thanks!
title: Internal Communication and/or Change Management Plans
